section.title: lms.djangoapps.instructor_task.rest_api.v1.exceptions module
section.paragraph: Exception classes for Instructor Task REST APIs.

desc_content.paragraph: An exception that occurs when trying to update an instructor task instance. This covers scenarios where an updated task schedule is not valid, or we are trying to update a task that has already been processed (is no longer in the SCHEDULED state).

section.title: lms.djangoapps.instructor_task.rest_api.v1.permissions module
section.paragraph: Instructor Task Django app REST API permission classes.

desc_content.paragraph: Permission class that ensures a user is allowed to interact with the bulk course messages in a given course-run.
Only course-staff/instructors or staff users should be able to modify the bulk course email messages or schedules.

section.title: lms.djangoapps.instructor_task.rest_api.v1.serializers module
section.paragraph: Instructor Task Django app REST API serializers.

desc_content.paragraph: Serializer for the course email instance belonging to each scheduled task.
Serializer for scheduled bulk email instructor tasks.

This function is responsible for retrieving and including course email instance information associated with each individual scheduled task. Uses the task related to the schedule to extract the email id of the scheduled message. From here we can lookup the individual message and attach it with the other API results.
Serializer field that converts the user object id to a human readable name (username)
Transform the outgoing native value into primitive data.
Serializer field that converts the email target values (recipient groups) of a message from an int to a human readable name.
Transform the outgoing native value into primitive data.

section.title: lms.djangoapps.instructor_task.rest_api.v1.urls module
section.paragraph: Instructor Task Django app REST API URLs.

section.title: lms.djangoapps.instructor_task.rest_api.v1.views module
section.paragraph: Instructor Task Django app REST API views.

desc_content.paragraph: Read only view to list all scheduled bulk email messages for a course-run.

definition_list_item.term: OK - Contains a list of all scheduled bulk email instructor tasks that havenâ€™t been executed yet. This

definition.paragraph: data also includes information about the and course email instance associated with each task.

list_item.paragraph: 403: User does not have the required role to view this data.

desc_content.paragraph: Filters the results so that only scheduled bulk email tasks for the specific course-run are returned.

definition_list_item.term: A view that supports the modification of instructor task schedules. It provides the ability to:

list_item.paragraph: Update an instructor task schedule and/or update the course email associated with the scheduled task.

field_body.paragraph: The schedule or email content was updated successfully. * 204: No Content - Deleting the schedule was successful. * 400: Bad request - Updating the email content or schedule failed due to bad data in the request. * 403: User does not have permission to modify the object specified. * 404: Requested schedule object could not be found and thus could not be modified or removed.
